// eslint-disable-next-line import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; const DashboardSidebar = props => { const { auth } = useSelector(state => state.userrr); return (
    {/* Only show admin dashboard to admins */} {auth.isAdmin && (

  • Admin

    • Add Category
    • Edit Categories
    • Users permissions
    • All Admins
    • All Shippers
    • )} {/* Only show sellers dashboard to admins */} {auth.isSeller && (

    • )}

); }; export default DashboardSidebar;
